review: I love my Amazon fire stick.  It's so easy to use.  I own a 2 chromecasts, a roku stick, a roku 3 and a roku 2 and I find that I use the fire stick more than the others.  My chromecasts are collecting dust because they tend to crash a lot and I'm tired of rebooting the device. I used to love using my rokus because I was able to watch Amazon Prime videos and easily control the channels with the remote. I've noticed that the fire stick is a lot faster than the chromecast too. Can't wait for the fire sticks to go on sale so I can pick up a few more.
